citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:07 p.m. on 24
JUL 24. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling the contact number provided and leaving a
message. While waiting, the facility representative returned the call and stated that he was unavailable for inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:07 p.m. on 24 
JUL 24. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling the contact number provided and leaving a 
message. While waiting, the facility representative returned the call and stated that he was unavailable for inspection. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
